method.name: float
method.description: Constructs a [float] as a copy of the given [float].

method.name: float
method.description: Cast a [bool] value to a floating-point value, [code]float(true)[/code] will be equal to 1.0 and [code]float(false)[/code] will be equal to 0.0.

method.name: float
method.description: Cast an [int] value to a floating-point value, [code]float(1)[/code] will be equal to [code]1.0[/code].
